name: Mein Herz brennt
wikiSummary: The track was featured in the 2002 Swedish film "Lilja 4-ever" (English: "Lilya 4-Ever") and the 2002 Israeli television series "Heaven or Hell".
wikiText:
The track was featured in the 2002 Swedish film "Lilja 4-ever" (English: "Lilya 4-Ever") and the 2002 Israeli television series "Heaven or Hell".
